content.question: <math alttext="the indefinite integral of, the fraction with numerator x minus 1, and denominator x plus 1, end fraction, d x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mo stretchy="true">∫</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle><mo>=</mo></mrow></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2, and denominator open parenthesis, x plus 1, close parenthesis, squared, end fraction, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></math>

<math alttext="x minus, 2 times the natural log of, the absolute value of, x plus 1, end absolute value, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator x squared, minus 2 x, and denominator x squared, plus 2 x, end fraction, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, one half times x squared, minus x, close parenthesis, times the natural log of, the absolute value of, x plus 1, end absolute value, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.15em"></mspace><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="x minus, 2 times the natural log of, the absolute value of, x plus 1, end absolute value, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></math>

topic.text: 6.10: Integrating Functions Using Long Division and Completing the Square

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
